title: US tours help firm impressions of Taiwan presidential contenders
description: Contenders from DPP, KMT and TPP have visited the US in recent weeks, with the trips important for both US officials and the candidates’ standing back home.

title: China outs yet another national as US ‘spy’, says he was groomed during visiting scholar stint
description: Suspect named Hou detained over ‘major espionage case’ at key defence and military industrial unit, CCTV show shared by state security ministry says.

title: US sends drone ships to navy bases in Japan, signalling new role for driverless vessels in deterring China
description: American unmanned surface vessels Mariner and Ranger sail from California to take part in naval exercises with manned warships in a move defence analysts say shows Washington plans to use them to deter Taiwan conflict.

title: Apple supplier Foxconn under tax and land use investigations in China: report
description: Chinese authorities are inspecting Foxconn’s facilities in southern Guangdong province and Jiangsu in the east, as well as carrying out on-site investigations into the company’s land use in central Hunan and Hubei provinces.

title: China’s focus on peaceful development in stark contrast to West’s war priorities
description: While the US, Europe and Western media were distracted by Ukraine and Israel’s war in Gaza, China brought together leaders from the Global South to celebrate 10 years of the Belt and Road Initiative. This showcased Beijing’s commitment to building infrastructure in the name of peace and development.

title: Chinese science fiction writer Hai Ya wins Hugo Award for best novelette
description: Author of The Space-Time Painter becomes third Chinese writer to receive the most prestigious international prize in sci-fi and fantasy.

title: Chinese cities hunt for strays after 2-year-old mauled by off leash Rottweiler
description: Drive has sparked online rumours of alleged dog culling, with most respondents in an online survey opposing the move and blaming owners for such attacks.

title: Keen to improve China ties, Turkey predicts 2 million tourists by 2030
description: As part of his country’s overall drive to enhance connectivity with China, the Turkish consul general in Hong Kong has set out estimates for a massive increase in tourism by 2030.

title: Australia wants ‘new type of relationship with China’, analyst says, as Prime Minister Albanese declares 4-day visit
description: Given its close trade ties with both US and China, Australia could potentially act as a bridge in multilateral ties, Sichuan University professor says.

title: Promising results as Chinese vaccine trial sees African swine fever fatality rate fall to zero
description: Chinese scientists reveal fatalities were reduced to zero after testing of potential vaccine.

title: South China Sea: Beijing and Manila trade accusations over ‘provocative’ ship collisions near disputed atoll
description: Beijing says Philippine coastguard ship ‘deliberately’ ran into fishing boat, while Manila blames Chinese coastguard for earlier crash near Second Thomas Shoal in the contested Spratly Islands.

title: Top Chinese beer maker Tsingtao opens probe after worker urination video goes viral
description: A video published on Weibo on Thursday appeared to show an employee urinating on raw ingredients. The company on Friday said it had contacted police and an investigation was under way.

title: New US curbs on chip exports to China set to escalate battle for tech supremacy
description: Observers say the response from Beijing so far has been measured, while Washington ‘has become increasingly pragmatic’.
